source_objects.title: Programming Languages
source_objects.description: Learn new languages or sharpen your exisiting skills with courses ranging from Intro to Python, Advanced Java, PHP and Ruby.

items.title: Computer Graphics with Modern OpenGL and C++
items.headline: Learn the theory and code behind modern OpenGL graphical applications so you can make games, simulations and more!
objectives_summary: Create 3D graphical applications using C++ and OpenGL
Use and understand GLEW and GLFW
Draw 3D objects to a window

items.title: Learn C++ by Creating
items.headline: Learn Programming Basics in C++ with a project based approach
objectives_summary: Create a portfolio of C++ projects using... C++
Get your computer ready to program in C++ using Visual Studio. (Level 0: Getting Started)
Create an application that handles standard output. (Level 1: Hello World!)

items.headline: This Java For Beginners Course Includes Java Basics And Core Java Skills Training To Make You A Software Developer Fast
objectives_summary: Learn the core Java skills needed to apply for Java developer positions in just 10 hours.
Have a fundamental understanding of the Java programming language.

items.title: Learn Perl 5 By Doing It

items.title: ASP NET Core 3 (ASP.NET 5),MVC,C#,Angular & EF Crash Course

items.title: Learn C++ for Game Development
items.headline: Learn the basics of C++ to prepare you for game development programming!
objectives_summary: Students will be able to start programming in Unreal Engine with C++ without being intimidated by its advanced techniques.
Students will have a solid understanding of C++ basics.
Students will learn both theory and practice with classroom style whiteboard talks, and lab style hands-on programming sessions.

items.title: Gradle Fundamentals
items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of Gradle
objectives_summary: Learn  and understand the fundamentals of Gradle.
Learn how to setup and use Gradle.
Learn how to build a Java project with Gradle.

items.title: Advanced Scala and Functional Programming | Rock the JVM

Master functional programming
Design and implement complex systems, frameworks and APIs

Build a solid understanding of Python Programming

items.headline: Learn how to tune the JVM and make good coding choices to ensure your applications perform optimally.
objectives_summary: What can cause performance issues in our applications, and how to resolve them.
The choices available to us as developers at design-time - how to make good coding choices for optimal performance.
How to configure the virtual machine to provide better performance at run-time.
